thread.title: HomeEscape Releases List of Top Ten Ways to Market your Property
thread.title_full: HomeEscape Releases List of Top Ten Ways to Market your Property

author: prbuzz.com
title: HomeEscape Releases List of Top Ten Ways to Market your Property
text:
MIAMI, FL (9/25/15) HomeEscape recently introduced an exclusive guide on how to develop the best marketing campaign for a vacation rental .
“We are really passionate about getting as much exposure to our user’s listings as possible,” remarked Avi Vaknin, CEO of HomeEscape. “With so much competition, it’s important to stand out from the pack,” he said.
HomeEscape offers a free platform where owners and travelers can benefit from free listings. “There’s no charge for users of HomeEscape. We are proud to be totally FREE listing service ,” Vaknin said.
HomeEscape offers users a growing resource of materials to those that want to educate themselves on the vacation rental industry. “Expect to see more content over the next few months as we roll out comprehensive guides on how to keep bookings high and consistent,” Vaknin remarked. “The excitement at HomeEscape is palpable.”
About HomeEscape : Headquartered in Miami, Florida, HomeEscape connects homeowners and property managers with travelers who seek the space, value and amenities of vacation rental homes as an alternative to hotels. With detailed property descriptions, photos and list of amenities and nearby attractions, HomeEscape makes it easy to find and compare properties all over the world.
